title: Drawing, "Studies. A: Maple Grove, Greensboro, Vt. B: Oak Trees at Lake Dunmore, Vt.", August 26, 1916
medium: A: Pen and black ink, gouache and pencil B: Pen and black ink,  watercolor, and colored pencil.
inscribed: A: Caption and date written in ink, bottom left.
description: A: Horizontal Rectangle. B: Vertical rectangle. A: A grove standing at a hillside. Framing ink lines. B: A group of oaks is shown in the foreground, standing at a hillside with a meadow. A wood is in the left background. caption and date written in pencil at the bottom. High bottom margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies. A: Maple Grove, Greensboro, Vt. B: Oak Trees at Lake Dunmore, Vt.", August 26, 1916.
August 26, 1916. A: Pen and black ink, gouache and pencil B: Pen and black ink,  watercolor, and colored pencil.. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-10-a.
